Package box

Class Box

java.lang.Object
box.Box
public class Box
extends java.lang.Object
Object of "Box" class is a box for our shapes. To store the shapes we use the List.

      Returns:
      false if shape isn't in a box

      public int numberOfFigure()
      How many shapes in the box.
      Returns:

    • sumOfArea
